segments.text: Hey , Mary , nice to see you again . I heard you're going back home to the U . S .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'm leaving tomorrow . I came here just because I want to say good-bye to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're so thoughtful . Wish you a good trip home . And we'll miss you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll miss you too , my friends .
segments.speaker: S2
